page.title: 02ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: {GRAPHIC ARTS, SCULPTURE, HOBBIES. { {GRAPHIC ARTS :}JUST ONE HALF OF THE SAMPLE WERE INTERESTED IN AND ACTIVE IN PAINTING, DRAWING, ETC., AND MOSTLY TOOK PART IN IT AT HOME RATHER THAN IN A CLUB. {SCULPTURE :}ONLY A QUARTER SHOWED ANY INTEREST IN SCULPTURE AND ONLY 3% DID ANY SCULPTING. {HOBBIES :}TWO-THIRDS OF THE SAMPLE USED ARTS AND CRAFTS AS A HOBBY FOR PLEASURE RATHER THAN PROFIT. OVERALL ARTS AND CRAFTS ARE ENCOURAGED IN OUR AREA WITH REGULAR DISPLAYS IN PLACES SUCH AS THE TOWN CENTRE AND COMMUNITY ESTABLISHMENTS. THE AREA IS ALSO MADE ATTRACTIVE BY THE WIDESPREAD USE OF SCULPTURE, CARVING, ETC. ON BOTH SMALL AND LARGE SCALES.
